sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes a mistake
, naredi nekaj, česar ni nameraval ali kar privede do nezaželenega rezultata.

seg.quote: He had made a terrible mistake.
We made the mistake of leaving our bedroom window open.

sense.def:
Kadar naredimo nekaj, česar nismo nameravali, lahko rečemo, da smo to naredili
by mistake.

seg.quote: I opened the door into the library by mistake.
At first he thought he had mistaken the address.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mistakes one person or thing for another
, zmotno misli, da je prva oseba ali stvar ona druga.

seg.quote: You mustn't mistake lack of formal education for lack of wisdom.
